info.name: Garlic Ranch Chicken Burger
info.description: A Garlic Ranch Chicken burger features a savory Fried Chicken patty seasoned with garlic and herbs, topped with creamy ranch. It's a flavorful twist on a classic burger, perfect for Chicken lovers.

info.name: Garlic Ranch Paneer Burger
info.description: A Garlic Ranch Paneer burger features a savory Paneer patty seasoned with garlic and herbs, topped with creamy ranch.

info.name: Garlic Ranch Veggie Burger
info.description: A Garlic Ranch Veggie burger features a savory veggie patty seasoned with garlic and herbs, topped with creamy ranch. It's a flavorful twist on a classic burger, perfect for veggie lovers.

info.name: Korean Kung Pao Chicken Burger
info.description: The Korean Kung Pao Chicken Burger, These flavors are complemented by the addition of classic Kung Pao sauce ingredients like soy sauce, rice vinegar, and a touch of sweetness from brown sugar.

info.name: Korean Kung Pao Paneer Burger
info.description: The Korean Kung Pao Paneer Burger, These flavors are complemented by the addition of classic Kung Pao sauce ingredients like soy sauce, rice vinegar, and a touch of sweetness from brown sugar.

info.name: Korean Kung pao Veggie Burger
info.description: The Korean Kung Pao Veggie Burger, These flavors are complemented by the addition of classic Kung Pao sauce ingredients like soy sauce, rice vinegar, and a touch of sweetness from brown sugar.

info.name: K-Pop Aloo Buffalo Sauce Burger
info.description: {Veg Preparation} Introducing our delectable creation: an Aloo Patty burger generously topped with buffalo sauce, tangy Korean Slaw, and a zesty Chipotle Mayo.Cheese is not included its available at extra cost.

info.name: K-Pop Aloo Honey Sriracha Burger
info.description: Introducing our delectable creation: an Aloo Patty burger generously topped with flavorful Honey Sriracha sauce, tangy Korean Slaw, and a zesty Chipotle Mayo. Cheese is not included its available at extra cost.

info.name: K-Pop Aloo Tikki Burger
info.description: Introducing our delectable creation: an Aloo Patty burger generously topped with flavorful mayo, tangy Korean Slaw, and a zesty Chipotle Mayo.Cheese is not included its available at extra cost.

info.name: K-Pop Buffalo Chicken Burger
info.description: K-Pop-inspired Chicken  delicately seasoned with a blend of Korean spices, adorned with a luscious  Buffalo Sauce, molten cheese, a revitalising Korean Slaw, and a bold dash of zesty Chipotle flair.

info.name: K-Pop Honey Sriracha Chicken Burger
info.description: K-Pop-inspired Chicken delicately seasoned with a blend of Korean spices, adorned with a luscious  Honey Sriracha Sauce, molten cheese, a revitalising Korean Slaw, and a bold dash of zesty Chipotle flair.

choices.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger

info.name: K-Pop BBQ Chicken Burger
info.description: K-Pop-inspired Chicken delicately seasoned with a blend of Korean spices, adorned with a luscious thick BBQ Sauce, molten cheese, a revitalising Korean Slaw, and a bold dash of zesty Chipotle flair.

choices.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger

info.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger
info.description: K-Pop-inspired Chicken  delicately seasoned with a blend of Korean spices, adorned with a luscious  Korean Hot Sauce, molten cheese, a revitalising Korean Slaw, and a bold dash of zesty Chipotle flair.

choices.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger

info.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Paneer Burger
info.description: Korean-style fried paneer patty topped with a tantalizing combination of Korean Hot Sauce, melted cheese, refreshing Korean Slaw, and a zesty Chipotle Mayo. Experience the perfect harmony of flavors as the crispy paneer patty meets the sweet and spicy sauce, enhanced by the creamy cheese, crunchy slaw, and a touch of heat from the Chipotle Mayo. Get ready to indulge in a culinary masterpiece that brings together the best of Korean and Indian influences.

info.name: K-Pop Buffalo Veggie Burger
info.description: {Veg Preparation} At the heart of our Korean Style Buffalo Veggie Burger is a tantalizing veggie patty, lovingly crafted to offer a satisfying texture and an explosion of flavors. This sauce perfectly balances the tangy zest of Buffalo sauce with the unique blend of Korean spices, offering a tantalizing kick that will captivate your taste buds.

info.name: K-Pop Buffalo Paneer Burger
info.description: {Veg Preparation} Korean-style fried paneer patty topped with tantalizing Korean Buffalo Sauce, melted cheese, refreshing Korean Slaw, and a zesty Chipotle Mayo drizzle. Experience the fusion of Korean and Indian flavors in every bite, where the crispy paneer patty meets the bold and tangy sauce, complemented by the creamy cheese, crunchy slaw, and a hint of spice. Get ready to embark on a culinary journey that combines the best of both worlds.

info.name: K-Pop Honey Sriracha  Paneer Burger
info.description: Korean-style fried paneer patty topped with a tantalizing combination of Korean Honey Sriracha Sauce, melted cheese, refreshing Korean Slaw, and a zesty Chipotle Mayo. Experience the perfect harmony of flavors as the crispy paneer patty meets the sweet and spicy sauce, enhanced by the creamy cheese, crunchy slaw, and a touch of heat from the Chipotle Mayo. Get ready to indulge in a culinary masterpiece that brings together the best of Korean and Indian influences.

info.name: K-Pop Honey Sriracha Veggie Burger
info.description: To infuse the burger with authentic Korean goodness, we generously coat the Veggie patty with our signature honey sriracha sauce. This sauce harmoniously combines the sweet allure of golden honey with the fiery kick of sriracha, creating a perfect balance of tastes that will tantalize your taste buds.

info.name: K-Pop BBQ Paneer  Burger
info.description: Korean-style fried paneer patty topped with savory Korean BBQ Sauce, melted cheese, refreshing Korean Slaw, and a touch of spicy Chipotle Mayo. Indulge in the perfect fusion of Korean and Indian flavors, where the crispy paneer patty meets the rich BBQ sauce, accompanied by the creamy cheese, crunchy slaw, and a hint of spice from the Chipotle Mayo.

info.name: K-Pop Classic Chicken Burger
info.description: K-Pop inspired Chicken, delicately seasoned with a blend of Korean spices, adorned with a luscious & a revitalising Korean Slaw, and a bold dash of zesty Chipotle flair.

info.name: K-Pop Classic Veggie Burger
info.description: Deep-fried veggie patty crowned with zesty Korean Hot n Sour Sauce, melted cheese, refreshing Korean Slaw, and a touch of spicy Chipotle Mayo. Indulge in this mouthwatering combination of textures and tastes that brings together the best of Korean-inspired flavors with a delightful twist.

info.name: Korean BBQ Loaded French Fries(Veg)
info.description: Crispy fries generously topped with smoky BBQ sauce, spicy jalapenos, melted cheese, and a savory seasoning. Experience the perfect balance of tangy, spicy, and cheesy flavors in every bite of this irresistible snack.

info.name: Garlic Mayo Loaded French Fries(Veg)
info.description: Our generously smother the fries with our signature garlic mayo sauce and cheesy sauce, handcrafted to perfection.

info.name: Korean Honey Sriracha Loaded French French Fries (Veg)
info.description: The magic begins with our mouthwatering Korean-inspired honey sriracha loaded Fries with loaded Cream cheese, carefully crafted to deliver a symphony of flavors.

info.name: Korean Buffalo Loaded French Fries (Veg)
info.description: "[Veg Preparation]" We drizzle a generous amount of creamy hot sauce over the loaded fries. This irresistible sauce perfectly ties all the elements together, creating a symphony of flavors that dance on your palate

info.name: Korean Hot n Spicy Loaded Fries (Veg)
info.description: A tantalizing blend of traditional Korean spicy cream loaded fries and fiery chili sauce, the punch of heat that will awaken your taste buds and keep you coming back for another bite.

info.name: Veg Spring Roll (4Pcs)
info.description: Delight in the crispy and savory goodness of Veg Spring Rolls, filled with a flavorful combination of vegetables.

info.name: French Fries
info.description: Crispy fries sprinkled with salt

info.name: Peri Peri Masala Fries
info.description: Crispy Fries sprinkled with peri peri seasoning

info.name: Crinkle Fries
info.description: Crispy Salted Crinkle Cut Fries

info.name: Peri Peri Crinkle Fries
info.description: Crispy Crinkle Cut Fries topped with Peri Peri Seasoning

info.name: Chicken Nuggets (5 Pcs)
info.description: Delight in the crispy and flavorful Chicken Nuggets, made from tender, seasoned chicken pieces that are breaded and fried to perfection.

info.name: Matcha Bubble Tea
info.description: Embark on a journey of traditional Japanese flavors with our Japanese Matcha Bubble Tea. Savor the distinct taste of premium matcha, meticulously crafted from finely ground green tea leaves, resulting in a vibrant and earthy flavor profile. Enjoy the velvety smoothness of this tea combined with the fun and chewy texture of tapioca pearls, creating a refreshing and authentic beverage experience.

info.name: Taro Bubble Tea
info.description: Experience the unique and indulgent delight of our Taro Bubble Tea. Delight in the creamy, earthy flavor of taro root, perfectly blended with a base of chilled tea and sweetened with a touch of sweetness. Immerse yourself in the velvety texture of this beverage, enhanced by the delightful chewiness of tapioca pearls, creating a truly memorable and satisfying drink.

info.name: Death By Chocolate Milkshake (without Boba)
info.description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing Chocolate, a delightful blend of rich cocoa and chilled milk. Indulge in the perfect balance of chocolatey goodness and playful textures in every sip.

choices.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger

info.name: Kit Kat Milkshake (without Boba)
info.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with our Kit Kat Milkshake, blending crushed Kit Kat chocolate bars into a creamy milkshake. Indulge in the perfect harmony of chocolatey goodness and playful sensations in every sip.

choices.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger

info.name: Oreo Milkshake (without Boba)
info.description: Experience the irresistible combination of cookies and cream with our Oreo Milkshake, blending crushed Oreo cookies into a creamy milkshake. Indulge in the perfect harmony of rich chocolate flavors, crunchy cookie bits, and playful textures in every sip.

choices.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger

info.name: Chili Guava (with Popping Bubbles)
info.description: Experience the fiery and fruity fusion of our Chilli Guava Mocktail with Popping Bubbles, blending the refreshing taste of guava with a hint of chili spice, accompanied by delightful popping bubbles for a unique twist.

choices.name: K-Pop Hot n Spicy Chicken Burger

info.name: Le Chocolate Bubble Shake
info.description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing Belgian Chocolate with Bubbles, a delightful blend of rich cocoa and chilled milk, accompanied by fun and chewy tapioca bubbles. Indulge in the perfect balance of chocolatey goodness and playful textures in every sip.

info.name: Tender Coconut Bubble Tea
info.description: Delight in the tropical paradise of our Tender Coconut Bubble Tea. Experience the creamy and refreshing taste of tender coconut, perfectly blended with chilled tea for a truly satisfying treat. Indulge in the delightful contrast of the smooth coconut flavor and the chewy tapioca pearls, creating a unique and enjoyable beverage that transports you to a sunny beach getaway.

info.name: Korean Honey Sriracha Chicken Wings (4 Pcs)

info.name: Korean Buffalo Wings (4 Pcs)

info.name: Korean Hot n Spicy Chicken Wings (4 Pcs)
